Theme Description

The FIFA World Cup Football Theme consists of 20+ HD World Cup Wallpapers, custom Football icons and music system sounds comprise of the Official 2010 World Cup song ?Waka Waka? by Shakira and Waving Flag by K?naan. Bring the spirit of this awesome sport on your desktop with our World Cup Windows 7 Theme.

FIFA World Cup is held every 4 years and unleashes a huge rush of adrenalin throughout its fans in all parts of the World. Everyone is following the World Cup either on TV. Mobile or the Internet. As the World Cup Fever gains momentum, we have created a special Windows 7 Theme dedicated to the Football World cup.

The Fans of Football are sure to love this one. This theme is the first release and may have updates.
